name: Scrumble
description: A simple cross-platform Markdown editor. Built with Tauri, React, Remirror, and ShadCN UI.

name: Games Radar
description: A micro-service site showing recent game releases fetched from rawg's api (also loosely cloned their layout).

name: Dotfiles
description: A collection of configuration files I've tweaked for a variety of tools I use on Windows and Mac.
